thread.title_full: 2nd stay. Quiet location and good night's sleep - Review of Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: boofus_smeg
title: 2nd stay. Quiet location and good night's sleep
text:
Decided on staying here again as cost was considerably cheaper than WE options and only 8 stops from Embankment. We staying in family room 215. Very clean room, comfy bed and so quiet you forget you're in London.
Only criticisms: not enough towels, tea bags or coffee sachets left in room.
